positions.title: Interpreter & Bilingual Administrator
positions.description: Bilingual Administrator for the South Hunterdon Regional School District community of teachers, administrators, counselors, and parents.

positions.title: Supervisor - HR Shared Services–
positions.description:
●	Manage a team of 8 agents at the myHR Contact Center, supporting Sanofi US, (100K employees) Canada, Chattem & Puerto Rico employees.  myHR Agents fill the gap, ensuring Sanofi employees are satisfied when navigating Well and Healthcare plans, Compliance, Onboarding, Payroll, Staffing, Stock Options, Retirement, Workday processes, and General HR Inquiries.
●	Strong communications, decision making, and problem-solving skills to ensure accurate tracking of HR metrics and programs.
●	Familiarity with HRIS systems and hands-on use of technology and dashboards for internal reporting.
●	Collaborate with the respective Centers of Expertise (COE), HRBPs, and Tier 2, following HR Policies and escalation procedures as required, ensuring employee satisfaction.
●	Provide full cycle HR support for Sanofi US, Canada, Chattem, and Puerto Rico employees, including Workday modules (Recruiting, Position Management, Performance, Talent, and Employee Core Data). Manage HR File Room Coordinators, who research and gather necessary files for Legal, HRBP’s, and employees as required.
●	Developed training modules for Tier 1 Agents, ensuring a smooth onboarding and continuous improvement experience for my team.
●	Developed and rolled out the myHR HUB, as a repository of key information and processes to fill in the gap of missing information and to ensure myHR Agents have all the tools to be successful in their roles, providing a better employee experience.
●	Recruit, and provide performance management for my team.  Provide employee training, career development, coaching, and corrective action as necessary.
●	Mentor and resource, for myHR Tier 1 agents, ensuring compliance with our targeted SLAs, resulting in greater team member problem solving and communications.

positions.title: Tier 1 Agent & Team Lead
positions.description:
●	Tier 1 Agent, and mentor and resource for myHR Tier 1 Agents; ensuring compliance with our targeted SLA’s resulting in greater team member problem solving and communications.
●	Guided employees and managers on navigating HR Record and Knowledge Base Tool (myHR Portal, Neocase, and Workday).
●	Received and processed employee data change requests, and escalated issues as necessary.
●	Supervised File Room Coordinators.
●	Assisted in ad-hoc projects for Management.

positions.title: MyHR Tier 1 Agent
positions.description:
●	First point of contact and mediator for Sanofi US, Canada, Chattem, and Puerto Rico employees, including Workday modules (Recruiting, Position Management, Performance, Talent, and Employee Core Data). Manage HR File Room Coordinators, who research and gather necessary files for Legal, HRBP’s, and employees as required.
●	Guided employees and managers on navigating HR Record and Knowledge Base Tool (myHR Portal, Neocase, and Workday).
●	Received and processed employee data change requests, and escalated issues as necessary.
●	Handled all aspects of the File Room operations, and streamlined the process for quicker turnaround time.

educations.fieldOfStudy: College/University Preparatory and Advanced High School/Secondary Diploma Program

honors.title: Performer of Distinction
honors.description: Recipient of MCI’s Performer of Distinction Award, for excellent Account Management.

allData.headline: Patient Advocacy
allData.summary:
At Zufall Health, my role as a Patient Representative encompasses leveraging my extensive background in bilingual communication and administration to ensure patient satisfaction and effective service delivery. Our team prioritizes compassionate care and clear communication, critical in nurturing trust and understanding within diverse patient populations.

My previous experience as an Interpreter and Bilingual Administrator at South Hunterdon Regional School District honed my expertise in human resources, problem-solving, and new business development. These skills have been fundamental in managing complex HR systems and fostering productive relationships across various organizational levels, underpinning my commitment to operational excellence and community engagement.
